sentence.Network_en: Their source is the Archean Group.

sentence.Network_en: Felsic gneiss is the most widely distributed rock type in Archean metamorphic complex areas.

sentence.Network_en: It's 100 % pure natural and is extracted from an archean plant -- Ginkgo Bibloba Tree.
